title: Wipro and NVIDIA Forge Alliance to Revolutionize Healthcare with AI
description: In a landmark development for healthcare technology, Wipro has announced a strategic collaboration with NVIDIA. This partnership is set to revolutionize the healthcare sector by accelerating the adoption of generative artificial intelligence (AI).
